name: insight-agent
description: NLP search and retrieval tool for PDF question-answering

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt -q && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
